name: Facebook in disguise, SFW, NO ADS!
description:
Facebook dark style without ads and with modified interface.
Now you can use it on every screen size.
Facebook at work - easy! No one will ever guess you using it... unless they'll ask you!
Suitable to use in small window up to 540 pixels small!

Facebook safe work - what could be better? :D
additional_info: Contributors: Devenv j1nx1t All suggestions and bugs please report to http://github.com/osleg/fbdark-wide-stylish/issues
